definition: to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: Read the fifth and the last paragraph of this text.
sentences.chinese: 讀本篇課文的第五段和最後一段。

sentences.english: Ever visited a website and got 3 free chapters of a book?
sentences.chinese: 是否曾因瀏覽網頁而得到一本書前三章的免費試讀本？

sentences.english: As cartoon primers on Buddhist philosophy go, it's not bad.
sentences.chinese: 作爲佛教哲學的卡通初級讀本，它還不錯。

sentences.english: Read easy books that were written for children.
sentences.chinese: 讀一些爲孩子們寫的簡單讀本。

sentences.english: Traditional textbooks changed into modern textbooks in the late Qing Dynasty in 1897.
sentences.chinese: 從傳統蒙學讀本向近代教科書轉變的過程發生在晚清。

sentences.english: Go to the museum, see a movie, read a good book, or take up oil painting (or some other hobby).
sentences.chinese: 去去博物館，看看電影，讀本好書什麼的。

sentences.english: A good book is another great way to enjoy your bath.
sentences.chinese: 享受洗澡的另外一個好方法是讀本好書。

sentences.english: The experiences of the prophets are the best reading materials for later generations.
sentences.chinese: 先知先覺們的經歷正是後人最好的讀本。

definition: reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)
to read and re-read sth until one is familiar with it
a series of books/a collection of books
books (in a library or bookstore)/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]
Four Books, namely: the Great Learning 大學|大学, the Doctrine of the Mean 中庸, the Analects of Confucius 論語|论语, and Mencius 孟子
